answers.text:
In many cases those phones have very little value and become the employees once they convert the plan to an individual one.  If the phones are newer and were a costly purchase; the finance department can figure out a way to depreciate them and establish a new cost to the employee.

text: We are considering going to a monthly stipend for cell phones. I know many cities have this type of policy. My question  is: What did you do with the phones the City already owned?
title: Cell Phones
